actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate duplication in the certification process for institutions and eligible courses under the Veterans and War Orphans' and Widows Educational Assistance provisions of this title.

summary.text: Sets forth a procedure to eliminate duplication in the certification process for institutions and eligible flight school courses under the Veterans War Orphans' and Widows' Educational Assistance Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to eliminate duplication in the certification process for institutions and eligible courses under the Veterans and War Orphans' and Widows Educational Assistance provisions of this title.
